Clearly we will need a function to check if a number is bouncy.

```{r}
bouncy <- function(x){
  digits <- as.numeric(unlist(strsplit(as.character(x),"")))
  return(digits)
}

a <- bouncy(155349)
a
c <- c(0,a)
c  
```

```{r}
(b <- c(a,0))
b-c
```
